profile.title: Profile
profile.description: Here you can edit public information about yourself.

generalTab.informationDesc: Your name may appear around Space2Study when mentioned.
generalTab.locationDesc: Let members know where you are based.
generalTab.professionalStatus: Describe in short your professional summary. Maximum 200 characters.
generalTab.languagesDesc: Select the language in which you would like to study and cooperate.
generalTab.videoPresentationDesc: Add the link to your presentational video. Your video needs to be public.
